alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:26AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Itawamba, southern Tishomingo and southeastern Prentiss Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 626 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belmont, or 7 miles northwest of Red Bay, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Bay, Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Tishomingo, Sandy Springs, Fairview, Golden, Paden, Eastman, Dennis, Moores Mill, Bloody Springs, Carter Branch, Mingo, Bounds Crossroads, Petertown and Neil. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
